definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle

sentences.english: However, the stage of entertainment world is cruel.
sentences.chinese: 然而演艺圈的舞台是残酷的。

sentences.english: When I first entered the entertainment industry, there was another Song Jia who was already very famous.
sentences.chinese: 在我刚进演艺圈的时候，另一个宋佳已经很出名了。

sentences.english: Back in America, she became a recluse and wrote a splendid memoir
sentences.chinese: 回到美国后，她开始渐渐退出演艺圈，转而写回忆录。

sentences.english: Just heard that a fellow Kpop artist friend, just committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 刚听说韩国演艺圈的一位艺人朋友刚刚自杀了。

sentences.english: Hye from the same year as professional actors, both public cohabitation in 1969.
sentences.chinese: 同年成蕙琳退出演艺圈，1969年两人公开同居。

sentences.english: The year 2000 marked the 20th year that Kylie has been in the 'show biz' industry.
sentences.chinese: 2000年是凯莉进入演艺圈儿的第二十个年头。

sentences.english: It's increasingly difficult to find a suitable body double in Showbiz.
sentences.chinese: 在演艺圈想找个合适的全身裸替越来越难了。

definition: to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
to make one's first public performance (of an entertainer etc)/to start one's career
to be popular/to be in luck/to have good luck/to develop smoothly
